---
name: Interop issue
about: Report a compatibility problem with a specific RTSP peer (camera)
labels: interop
---

**Short summary:**


**RTSP peer info:**

For cameras: please include make, model, and firmware version (if known).

**retina version:**

**How to reproduce:**

* if possible, a command using the example, e.g.: `cargo run --package client mp4 -- --url rtsp://ip.address.goes.here/ --username admin --password test out.mp4`
* otherwise, example code is appreciated

**Additional information:**

<details>
<summary>retina log output</summary>
...
</details>

If you're comfortable, please attach a packet capture (`.pcap` or `.pcapng` file). Retina's author would also be happy to examine one privately; email slamb@lsamb.org. See <https://github.com/scottlamb/moonfire-nvr/wiki/Reporting-a-camera-interop-issue>.
